name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Github Pages to Github Repo Converter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This ext. takes a link for a Github Pages site as an input and opens up the related Github repository upon hitting search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Many times I have visited someones Github Pages site and wanted a quick way to get to their actual Github repo. So here is a quick converter that does it for you.
